00028 #include "qep_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"
00030 
00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qhsm_ini)
00032

00037 //............................................................................
00038 QHsm::~QHsm() {
00039 }
00040 //............................................................................
00041 void QHsm::init(QEvent const *e) {
00042     QStateHandler t;
00043     QS_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00044 
00045                               // the top-most initial transition must be taken
00046     Q_ALLEGE((*m_state)(this, e) == Q_RET_TRAN);
00047 
00048     t = (QStateHandler)&QHsm::top;              // HSM starts in the top state
00049     do {                                           // drill into the target...
00050         QStateHandler path[QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_];
00051         int8_t ip = (int8_t)0;                  // transition entry path index
00052 
00053 
00054         QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_STATE_INIT, QS::smObj_, this)
00055             QS_OBJ_(this);                        // this state machine object
00056             QS_FUN_(t);                                    // the source state
00057             QS_FUN_(m_state);          // the target of the initial transition
00058         QS_END_()
00059 
00060         path[0] = m_state;
00061         (void)QEP_TRIG_(m_state, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);
00062         while (m_state != t) {
00063             ++ip;
00064             path[ip] = m_state;
00065             (void)QEP_TRIG_(m_state, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);
00066         }
00067         m_state = path[0];
00068                                                // entry path must not overflow
00069         Q_ASSERT(ip < (int8_t)QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_);
00070 
00071         do {           // retrace the entry path in reverse (desired) order...
00072             QEP_ENTER_(path[ip]);                            // enter path[ip]
00073             --ip;
00074         } while (ip >= (int8_t)0);
00075 
00076         t = path[0];                   // current state becomes the new source
00077     } while (QEP_TRIG_(t, Q_INIT_SIG) == Q_RET_TRAN);
00078     m_state = t;
00079 
00080     QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_INIT_TRAN, QS::smObj_, this)
00081         QS_TIME_();                                              // time stamp
00082         QS_OBJ_(this);                            // this state machine object
00083         QS_FUN_(m_state);                              // the new active state
00084     QS_END_()
00085 }
